argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fourierdlem5.1 | |- S = ( x e. ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) |-> ( sin ` ( ( X + ( 1 / 2 ) ) x. x ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( X e. RR /\ x e. ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) ) -> X e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | #P_1red | |- ( ( X e. RR /\ x e. ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) ) -> 1 e. RR ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_rehalfcld | |- ( ( X e. RR /\ x e. ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) ) -> ( 1 / 2 ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_readdcld | |- ( ( X e. RR /\ x e. ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) ) -> ( X + ( 1 / 2 ) ) e. RR ) |
| 6 |  | #P_pire | |- _pi e. RR |
| 7 | 6 | #P_renegcli | |- -u _pi e. RR |
| 8 |  | #P_iccssre | |- ( ( -u _pi e. RR /\ _pi e. RR ) -> ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) C_ RR ) |
| 9 | 7, 6, 8 | #P_mp2an | |- ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) C_ RR |
| 10 | 9 | #P_sseli | |- ( x e. ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) -> x e. RR ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( X e. RR /\ x e. ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) ) -> x e. RR ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_remulcld | |- ( ( X e. RR /\ x e. ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) ) -> ( ( X + ( 1 / 2 ) ) x. x ) e. RR ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_resincld | |- ( ( X e. RR /\ x e. ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) ) -> ( sin ` ( ( X + ( 1 / 2 ) ) x. x ) ) e. RR ) |
| 14 | 13, 1 | #P_fmptd | |- ( X e. RR -> S : ( -u _pi [,] _pi ) --> RR ) |
